entities.name: dragon
entities.description: The dragon is described as having vertical pupils like a cat's and making a horrible noise. It is also mentioned that it can shoot fire at a range of twenty feet.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a wizard who is trying to keep back the dragon. He is described as yelling and holding a chain.

relationships.description: The dragon is attacking Hagrid, as evidenced by its horrible noise and the fact that it can shoot fire at a range of twenty feet.
